resources.string: Commands with over 50% success — apply from highest to lowest
Tap a command to copy or apply it

This section allows you to test the app using a set of pre-defined commands. 
During testing, the system checks the accessibility of various websites through the proxy, and you can monitor progress in real time. 
 
Note that this testing feature is still under development, and the set of commands is currently limited. 
Test results may be useful for initial proxy evaluation but do not guarantee flawless operation under real-world conditions.

Did the app crash during testing? 

Go to test settings and increase the delay between commands by 3 seconds. 

It may also be caused by modified hosts and/or AdAway running.
Make all commands clickable in test log
